channel.title: internet on Joe Garrett
channel.description: Recent content in internet on Joe Garrett

item.title: What is this website for?
item.description: I am making this website to: share informal information about projects I’ve worked on link the projects to repositories share occassional thoughts on technological development This site will primarily be a location show a little about the projects I’ve worked on over the past decade or so. The associated scientific papers are not the best introductions. They’re a little too technical. An informal explanation of the methodology and results should help other scientists decide whether or not they want to adopt a technique.
